name: Lume: The Cardgame
description:
Lume is a tactical card game inspired by Pokémon and Avatar. 

It puts you in the middle of a conflict between the Kingdom of Earth and the Fire Empire, where you must pick a side and lead it to victory.

Choose between Fire and Earth, command your units on the battlefield, defeat enemy units in combat by playing attack cards and win the game when the enemy army is completely annihilated.

Local and online multiplayer.
